Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Human Meteor and Initial Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Duke O'Dowd as the Human Meteor and sets up initial conflicts both underwater and on land, establishing his dual identity and early missions.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Introduction
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Human Meteor encountering divers underwater, setting up initial conflict and mystery.

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Ride and Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Duke O'Dowd as a taxi driver picks up suspicious passengers and notices he is being followed, building suspense.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi Ride to the Waterfront and Suspicion

sub_scenes.title: Transformation and Pier Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Duke transforms into Human Meteor after dropping off passengers, immediately confronting perceived threats on land.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Pier and Transformation

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Revelation and Mission Planning
sub_scenes.description: In the hospital, a new threat is revealed, leading to a plan involving Toby to investigate a yacht.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Revelation of Yacht and Submarine Plot
Duke's Plan and Toby's Stowaway Mission

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht and Submarine Espionage
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the investigation of a suspicious yacht and its connection to a Japanese submarine, involving undercover work and underwater action.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Deck Suspicion and Depth Chart Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Pete's observations on the yacht deck and Duke/Toby's discovery of a marked depth chart in the cabin.

narrative_arcs.title: Depth Chart Discovery and Sudden Fall

sub_scenes.title: Namor's Underwater Intervention and Ship Attack
sub_scenes.description: Namor's urgent dive, discovery of the sunken submarine and torpedo operation, and subsequent confrontation and attack on the ship.

narrative_arcs.title: Sunken Submarine Discovery and Underwater Encounter
Subduing a Diver and Submarine's Evasion
Confrontation with the Red Suit Diver and Underwater Struggle
Namor's Surface Attack on the Ship with Torpedo

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Peter's Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Yacht pursuit, discovery of Peter's death and his connection to the Japanese Navy, leading to Holden's recovery and return home.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Peter in Diving Helmet
Investigation in Peter's Cabin and Jap Navy Connection
Confirmation of Peter's Double Life and Swift Action
Driving Toby Home After a Long Day
Arriving Home and Mother's Concern for Toby

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads and Nazi Spy Ring
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Liberty Lads and their confrontation with Nazi spies, leading to an ambulance chase and the discovery of a Nazi spy ring.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Confrontation and Ambulance Mystery
sub_scenes.description: Liberty Lads confront Nazi Fiends and an ambulance arrives, sparking curiosity and investigation by two boys.

sub_scenes.title: Wallet Clue and Garage Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Boys find a wallet dropped by ambulance interne, leading them to a garage and an encounter with marines and Major Bronson.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and Garage Clue
Marine Salute and Major Bronson's Civilian Clothes

sub_scenes.title: Capture by Mr. Horst and Bronson's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Boys are intercepted by police, taken to Mr. Horst, captured, and then rescued by Major Bronson.

sub_scenes.title: Marine Barracks and Spy Ring Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Boys seek help, discover secret office and sabotage plans, leading to a car crash at Marine Barracks and the takedown of a Nazi spy ring.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Head to Waterfront for Help
The Marines Engage in a Scrap
Urgent Medical Aid for the Major

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ in South America and Rosita's Rescue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows The Champ and Henry in South America as they get entangled in a kidnapping case, leading to a rescue mission for Rosita.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction in South America and Initial Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of The Champ and Henry, setting the scene in South America and their initial encounter with local authorities.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Setting the Scene
Arrival in a Sleepy South American Town

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Plot and Forced Journey
sub_scenes.description: Exposition on El Tigre's demands and the kidnapping of men who are then taken to Rosita's mother.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Revelation at the House

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Hideout Infiltration and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Approach to El Tigre's hideout, use of diversion tactics, and confrontation with El Tigre.

sub_scenes.title: Search for Rosita and Axis Agents Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Humiliation of a character, frantic search for Rosita, and revelation of Axis agents involvement.

sub_scenes.title: Rosita's Rescue and Victory
sub_scenes.description: Internal conflict about El Tigre, urgent news about Rosita's location by Axis agents, rescue mission, hotel infiltration, and final resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Pursuit and Initial Attack on Axis Forces
Seeking Refuge and Planning Entry via Rear
Machine Gun Deployment and Presidential Orders
Gratitude for Life-Saving Bravery and Recognition
Arrival of Government Troops and Search for Rosita

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan and Sub Detector Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features Devil Dog Dolan in jungle combat, dealing with compromised sub detector plans and betrayal.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Betrayal Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Jungle combat with spies, report of disobedience and compromised sub detector plans, leading to Dolan's jungle pursuit.

narrative_arcs.title: Grave Report and Canal Zone Discussion
Dolan's Displeasure and Sub Detector Plans

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Interrogation, and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Capture of spies, interrogation for sub detector plans, and betrayal under duress.

narrative_arcs.title: Fatherland's Demand and Hot Iron Threat

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath, Pursuit, and Tribal Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Aftermath of betrayal, pursuit of plans, jungle fire diversion, native attack, and unexpected alliance with natives.

Major_Arcs.title: Service Spanking and Twinkle Twins Introduction
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers shipboard drama, a brawl, disciplinary action for Dolan and introduction of the Twinkle Twins.

sub_scenes.title: Shipboard Drama and Brawl
sub_scenes.description: Surrender decision on ship, surprise encounter leading to a brawl and resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins
sub_scenes.description: Dramatic introduction of the Twinkle Twins and their backstory of fighting back against gangsters.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Twinkle Twins Story

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Banker Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the Twinkle Twins' investigation into the murder of banker Robert Burgess, uncovering a complex web of racketeering and sacrifice.

sub_scenes.title: Newspaper Assignment and Initial Investigation
sub_scenes.description: Newspaper assignment to investigate banker's murder, initial leads, and police station inquiry.

narrative_arcs.title: Information from Sailor and Headquarters Decision
Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead
Press Passes and Revelation of Sick Child

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Revelations and Candy Store Strategy
sub_scenes.description: Hospital revelations about Barnacci and blood type, leading to a candy store phone call for further investigation.

narrative_arcs.title: Candy Store Phone Call and New Lead
Arrival in the Irish Section and Pursuit of Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Inquiry and Mrs. Murphy's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Inquiry in the Irish section leading to Mrs. Murphy, who reveals Reilly's innocence and Farnacci's scheme.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Information in the Irish Section

sub_scenes.title: Cab Chase, Roadblock, and Street Brawl
sub_scenes.description: Quick getaway, cab chase, roadblock by angry crowd, street brawl, and police intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and De-escalation at the Roadblock

sub_scenes.title: Medical Emergency and Community Blood Drive
sub_scenes.description: Police aftermath, emergency medical response for injured, hospital wait, and community blood drive to save Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Emergency Medical Response and Hospital Wait
Blood Transfusion Need and Community Blood Drive
Blood Type Matching and Transfusion Preparation
Blood Transfusion in Progress and Doctor's Reassurance
Demand for Farnacci's Blood and Police Plan
Police Raid and Arrest of Farnacci
Birthday Celebration for Reilly's Daughter's Recovery
